name: Mercurial (Geryon Games)
description:
In Mercurial, your attacks are unstable and constantly cycle as you're kept on your toes dodging and killing zombies and bats.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move

Click - Attack

Attack Colors:

Gray - None, Blue - Dash, Brown - Ground Pound,  Purple - Laser

Art, Music,  & SFX - BananaGuyBob

Programming - GeryonGames
